basics.name: Doron Tsur
basics.summary: I’m a software developer in the JavaScript (ES6/TS) ecosystem with background in C++/Java. Would love to work with great people, technology and scale while using and creating open source software. Playing around with python and golang these days.

highlights: Research consensus algorithms
Build prototypes in golang

work.summary: Wix.com is a leading cloud-based web development platform.
highlights: Software developer in Wix.Com innovation labs.
Created closed source transpiler.
Developed a vscode plugin: https://github.com/wix/stylable-intelligence.
Developed and maintained custom made CI system.
Docker, git, AWS, NPM, Selenium, Karma, Mocha, Sinon, Chai, verdaccio.
Typescript, React, Webpack, ES6/7, Transpilers, htmlparser2.
TDD style development.
Interviewed and assisted with on-boarding of junior developers.

work.summary: NextNine provides OT security solution for critical infrastructures using remote services and automation.
highlights: As a C++ Developer I was responsible for two parts of NextNine solution, the core of an enterprise web application and the Main node of a distributed system.
Research SVN, XMPP, and WebRTC
Used tools such as Jira, IntelliJ and VC6 with technologies like COM, OO4O, MSADO and WINAPI32.
Experience in the Linux system and open source in general.
Interviewed external consultants

work.summary: NextNine provides OT security solution for critical infrastructures using remote services and automation.
highlights: Provide Tier 3 support for the company's main product.
Track down production system bottlenecks and unknown issues.
Provide workarounds and code solutions. Backup the professional services team.
Developed in Perl, VBScript and Java

work.summary: Quanits labs were an algorithmic trading company.
highlights: Monitor and control an automatic trading software.
Provide technical support for the company’s product.
Fix in house tools and monitor the software’s network.
Jewish camp counselor in the rock climbing, hiking and social field.
Lead a group of Israeli kids to a US summer camp.
Participated in the first year of 'Avihai' program.
Organiz/ed games with hundreds of participants
Leadership the live roleplaying group.
